entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 10.0°C

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
